intent_atoms.description: Implement app theming for icon and light/dark modes
Accent palette and SwiftUI tint wiring must be included in Summary_of_Work.md as of 2025-10-17
Production icon rasterization is tracked via @todo PDD:45m
Execute random slice benchmark suite on macOS with Combine support to compare mapped vs chunked readers under identical workloads
Benchmark must be executed only when a macOS runner with Combine is available
Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS with XCTest UI to validate end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow
Testing requires macOS UI testing entitlements and cannot run in container
Execute Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining throughput parity with CLI harness
Benchmark must only run on mac‑macOS runner with Xcode/Combine

functional_units.name: App Theming
functional_units.description: Provides icon and light/dark theme support with accent palette and SwiftUI tint wiring

functional_units.name: Benchmark Validation
functional_units.description: Executes random slice benchmark suite on macOS to compare mapped vs chunked readers under identical workloads

functional_units.name: Streaming UI Coverage
functional_units.description: Runs ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS to validate end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow for streaming selection

functional_units.name: Combine UI Benchmark Follow-Up
functional_units.description: Executes Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining throughput parity with CLI harness
